Interval.description: The publishing interval might be set between 0 (immediately on change) and <n> ms (if supported). By default, any DataSetMessage gets published on change => interval = 0

Config.description: The configurability of subscriptions is limited to create/delete/not manipulable â€“ depending on implementation and/or technical needs: NONE_0: No configuration possible (delete is not possible). CONF_1: Free configurable (delete is possible)
